The status of Data Plan in use will be changed to 'Used' and this New Data Plan will be activated.
Press the 'OK' button and call 0000# to use new plan.

his:noUsage2: Now, experience how easy and convenient it is!
his:cancelAlert: Are you sure you want to cancel the payment?
his:cancelError: An error occurred while canceling payment.
his:afterCancelInfo: • Depending on the payment method, it takes 3 to 7 business days on a weekday to get a refund from a cancellation request.
his:simCancelInfo:
• Once the product has been prepared, you cannot change the delivery address or cancel the payment. 
• Please use the 1: 1 inquiry for return and refund requests after receipt of the product.
his:usedOrExpiredInfo: • The product has been used or the deadline for canceling payment has expired.
his:dataCancelInfo: • If all products included in the payment are not in use, you can cancel them within 7 days after payment.
contact:title: Help Center
board:title: 1:1 Inquiry board
board:noti: When your inquiry is answered, you will be notified via ROKEBI App notification and your e-mail.
cart:dlvCostNotice: * Free delivery is available if total amount payment is more than KRW 30,000

esim:showQR:title: QR Code
esim:showQR:body: Go to <color:'#2a7ff6'>Setting>Cellular>Add cellular plan</color>, then scan QR code below. (You can scan this QR Code on another device).
esim:manualInput:title: eSIM Info
esim:manualInput:body: Go to <color:'#2a7ff6'>Setting>Cellular>Add Cellular Plan</color> and Tap <color:'#2a7ff6'>"Enter Details Manually"</color>, then plz enter activation info below manually
pym:esimInfo: * Please note that eSIM product you purchased can't be cancelled or refunded after recieving activation info via your email and App.
pym:title: Payment Info
pym:balPurchase: It will be paid from ROKEBI Cash.

pym:atFrontDoor: Please put it in front of the house.
pym:toDeliveryBox: Please put it in the delivery box.
pym:toSecurity: Please leave it at the security office.
pym:tossInfo: * Toss Pay can be used in the 'Credit Card' menu.
pym:kakaoInfoContent:
- Save up ₩5,000 if you do settlement for the first time in your life(4/1 ~ 4/30, Once within the period)
- Kakao Pay is available in the latest version. Please update.
